revised_title: Extinct Fauna of Rodriguez: Osteology of the Solitaire (Pezophaps solitaria, Gmel.)
tldr: The authors describe the osteology of the extinct solitaire bird (Pezophaps solitaria) found on Rodriguez Island, focusing on the skeletal structure, including the cervical and dorsal vertebrae, pelvis, and sternum. They also discuss the differences in the skeletal structure compared to other bird species and the variations found in the collected specimens.
